Plot: An extremely volatile and dangerous Englishman goes to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his daughter's death.
Title: The Limey
Actors: Terence Stamp, Lesley Ann Warren, Luis Guzmán, Barry Newman
tomatoConsensus: Crafted with eccentric moodiness and style by Steven Soderbergh, The Limey is also a gritty neo-noir showcase for the talent of leading man Terence Stamp.
